text: The Académie Française (English: The French Academy) is France's main authority on the French language. It was created in Paris on 22 February 1635. Like the French Academy of Sciences, it is one of five academies in the Institut de France. == Other websites == * L'Académie française * L'Académie française from the Scholarly Societies project Category:Language regulators Category:French language Category:Buildings and structures in Paris Category:1635 establishments Category:National academies Category:1630s establishments in Europe Category:17th-century establishments in France Category:Organizations based in Paris
title: Académie Française
